casebody.data:
Janice THOMPSON
v.
Christopher Lee BASS and Donald Wayne Boyd No. 334P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 4, 2019 Andy W. Gay, Darren G. Jackson, Daniel Patrick McNally, Attorneys at Law, Zebulon, for Thompson, Janice Kevin N. Lewis, Attorney at Law, Ahoskie, for Boyd, Donald Wayne J. Richard Hamlett, II, William D. Etheridge, Attorneys at Law, Nashville, for Bass, Christopher Lee

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of October 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of January 2019."
